name: CSV Generator
description: Parses a given CSV file with predefined or provided headers.

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: Optionally specify on which nodes to run and how many instances you want on each node.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of node handler, one of SingleNode, SomeNodes, AllNodes (leave empty for local execution)

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: The nodes to use for this node handler type

parameters.name: instances
parameters.description: The amount of instances per node of this handler type

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The name of the file to read from.

parameters.name: encoding
parameters.description: The characterset encoding of the file.

parameters.name: has_headers
parameters.description: If set to true, the first row will be considered the headers, and will be used as value names.

parameters.name: predef_headers
parameters.description: Will be ignored if has_headers is true. Otherwise the list provided will be used in order as headers, ie. as value names for the columns.

parameters.name: flattened
parameters.description: Will be ignored if has_headers is false and no predef_headers are provided. Otherwise it will flatten the result given by those headers, or not by mapping resultName to that map.

parameters.name: separator
parameters.description: The separator character used in the given CSV file.

parameters.name: quote
parameters.description: The quote character used in the given CSV file.

parameters.name: escape
parameters.description: The escape character used in the given CSV file.

parameters.name: start_line
parameters.description: The line number (starting with 0) to start reading from. From beginning if not entered. Does not include the header.

parameters.name: end_line
parameters.description: The last line number to read. Until the end of the file if not entered.

parameters.name: batch_size
parameters.description: While lines are processed one by one, the buffered reader takes them in batches. Tweak for best performance.

parameters.name: batched
parameters.description: Whether or not to send the buffered lines all at once or line by line.

parameters.name: ignore_error_lines
parameters.description: If set to true, a line that cannot be parsed will be ignored. Note that this can be dangerous if the error spans more than one (CSV) line.
